dmca.title: Copyright violation
dmca.body:
Andrews McMeel Universal, through its companies Universal Press
Syndicate, Andrews McMeel Publishing and uclick, is the exclusive licensee of the comics, games and text content syndicated by Universal Press Syndicate.
(A complete list of these features can be found at www.ucomics.com http://www.ucomics.com and www.uexpress.com  http://www.uexpress.com.)
It has come to our attention that the web site at:
[NON-PUBLISHED DEEP-LINKING TEST WEB ADDRESS] is displaying several syndicated comic features, including FoxTrot, a feature syndicated by Universal Press Syndicate.

Andrews McMeel Universal and uclick have not given permission for such
use of the comic panels and strips.  Such unauthorized use of copyright images (or derivative images) constitutes a violation of federal copyright law.  We must therefore insist that you remove the aforementioned comics, and confirm your actions in writing.  The timing, nature and tenor of your response to this e-mail will determine what, if any, legal action we will take in this matter.
Please feel free to verify who we are by visiting our web site at http://www.uexpress.com/ and http://www.ucomics.com.

[private]
Director of Permissions
Business Development
uclick
